titles.title: Humble Thyself In The Sight Of The Lord

properties.copyright: 1978 Maranatha! Music / CCCM Music, Administered by Maranatha! Music

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Cm
Humble thyself
In the sight of the Lord
Humble thyself
In the sight of the Lord
And He shall lift you up
Higher and higher
And He shall lift you up
